net.imglib2.cache.img.optional

Interface CellDimensionsOptions<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.scijava.optional.Options<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiskCachedCellImgOptions, ReadOnlyCachedCellImgOptions

    public interface CellDimensionsOptions<T>
extends org.scijava.optional.Options<T>
    Optional arguments that specify the dimensions of a Cell.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CellDimensionsOptions.Val 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T cellDimensions(int... cellDimensions)
      Set the dimensions of a cell.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.scijava.optional.Options

        setValue

    • Method Detail

      • cellDimensions

        default T cellDimensions(int... cellDimensions)
        Set the dimensions of a cell. This is extended or truncated as necessary. For example if cellDimensions=[64,32] then for creating a 3D image it will be augmented to [64,32,32]. For creating a 1D image it will be truncated to [64].
        Parameters:
        cellDimensions - dimensions of a cell (default is 10).
